extendedInfo.description: The classic and exciting Bubble Shoot game.How to play - Don't use the arrows on the bottom, just tap on the game board where you specifically want the ball. Click the menu key to select levels and other options.Knock the bubbles down by forming clusters of three or more bubbles.Your goal is to clear all the bubbles before they overflow the bottom lineThis project is base on Frozen Bubble distributed under the GNU GPL v2.Notes: The first 100 levels of the puzzle mode are derived from frozen bubble and the remaining levels are created by us.
